message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $9,500, which reflects its high quality and the benefits it will bring you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Is that something we can work with?

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  However, $7,500 is significantly below the value of this product.  I'm willing to come down to $9,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the benefits it will provide you.
I'm still thinking that $8,200 is a fair price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
